properties.value: The elysian spirit shield requires 75 Defence and 75 Prayer to wield. The shield is made by attaching an elysian sigil, a rare drop from the Corporeal Beast, to a blessed spirit shield at an anvil with a hammer. This process requires 90 Prayer and 85 Smithing. Players without the required skill levels to create the shield may ask Abbot Langley in the Edgeville Monastery to combine the sigil and the blessed spirit shield, for a fee of 1,500,000 coins.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Elysian spirit shield
This article is about the shield. For the quest item, see Elysian spirit shield (Monkey Madness II).
Elysian spirit shield

Item ID12817

The elysian spirit shield requires 75 Defence and 75 Prayer to wield. The shield is made by attaching an elysian sigil, a rare drop from the Corporeal Beast, to a blessed spirit shield at an anvil with a hammer. This process requires 90 Prayer and 85 Smithing. Players without the required skill levels to create the shield may ask Abbot Langley in the Edgeville Monastery to combine the sigil and the blessed spirit shield, for a fee of 1,500,000 coins.

This shield has superior Melee and Ranged defence bonuses compared to the arcane and spectral spirit shields, as well as a powerful passive effect. It has the highest crush defense in the shield slot. In terms of mitigating damage taken, the elysian spirit shield is one of the most powerful shields in Old School RuneScape.

Passive effect[edit | edit source]

The shield's passive effect.

The elysian spirit shield has a 70% chance of reducing the damage the player receives by 25%. On average, this results in a 17.5% overall damage reduction. The passive effect stacks with the Justiciar armour set effect.

The passive effect does not work against all sources of damage: certain monster special attacks (such as dragonfire) as well as non-combat damage (such as poison) are unaffected.

Opponents' healing effects such as the enchanted onyx bolt effect or Guthan's set are not reduced and will heal the full amount, even if the passive effect takes place. Recoil damage, such as Vengeance, is applied after the damage reduction.

If damage would have been taken when the effect activates, a minimum of 1 is reduced, even if the original hit would have been 1. This makes the shield especially useful against monsters such as the Kraken as its tentacles only have a maximum hit of 2 yet hit often.[1]

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
14 June 2018
(update)

The elysian spirit shield, along with the others, was made slightly clearer in-game. Female characters also now have their own unique model, reducing the distance between the shields and their bodies.

18 February 2017
(update | poll)

The passive effect now works against more damage sources, particularly those that can bypass protection prayers.

20 November 2014
(update | poll)

A small animation will now play when the passive effect occurs.

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 6 May 2020. (Archived from the original on 22 August 2021.) Mod Ash: "[does the ely passive effect work against kraken and/or its tentacles?] Yes."

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The original incarnation of the elysian spirit shield in RuneScape 2 did not feature a unique animation when the passive effect occurred.
  • The shield's name is a reference to the Elysian Fields in Greek mythology.
  • When Nieve is killed during Monkey Madness II, the player has the opportunity to retrieve her elysian spirit shield, however those who do soon find out that it has crumbled to dust and is useless.
  • When attaching an elysian sigil to a blessed spirit shield, the shield becomes lighter in weight. This trait is not shared with its arcane and spectral variants.

[[File:Elysian spirit shield detail.png|left|120px]]
The '''elysian spirit shield''' requires 75 [[Defence]] and 75 [[Prayer]] to wield. The shield is made by attaching an [[elysian sigil]], a rare drop from the [[Corporeal Beast]], to a [[blessed spirit shield]] at an [[anvil]] with a [[hammer]]. This process requires 90 [[Prayer]] and 85 [[Smithing]]. Players without the required skill levels to create the shield may ask [[Abbot Langley]] in the [[Edgeville Monastery]] to combine the sigil and the blessed spirit shield, for a fee of 1,500,000 coins.

This shield has superior [[Melee]] and [[Ranged]] defence bonuses compared to the [[Arcane spirit shield|arcane]] and [[spectral spirit shield]]s, as well as a powerful [[passive effect]]. It has the highest crush defense in the [[shield slot]]. In terms of mitigating damage taken, the elysian spirit shield is one of the most powerful shields in ''Old School RuneScape''.

==Passive effect==
[[File:Elysian spirit shield special effect.gif|thumb|The shield's passive effect.]]
The elysian spirit shield has a 70% chance of reducing the damage the player receives by 25%. On average, this results in a 17.5% overall damage reduction. The passive effect stacks with the [[Justiciar armour]] set effect.

The passive effect does not work against all sources of damage: certain monster special attacks (such as [[dragonfire]]) as well as non-combat damage (such as [[poison]]) are unaffected.

Opponents' healing effects such as the [[Onyx bolts (e)|enchanted onyx bolt]] effect or [[Guthan the Infested's equipment|Guthan's set]] are not reduced and will heal the full amount, even if the passive effect takes place. Recoil damage, such as [[Vengeance]], is applied after the damage reduction.

If damage would have been taken when the effect activates, a minimum of 1 is reduced, even if the original hit would have been 1. This makes the shield especially useful against monsters such as the [[Kraken]] as its [[Enormous Tentacle|tentacles]] only have a maximum hit of 2 yet hit often.{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/1257954901637955585|date=6 May 2020|archiveurl=https://archive.is/hzWla|archivedate=22 August 2021|quote=[does the ely passive effect work against kraken and/or its tentacles?] Yes.}}

==References==
{{Reflist}}

==Trivia==
*The original incarnation of the elysian spirit shield in ''RuneScape 2'' did not feature a unique animation when the passive effect occurred.
*The shield's name is a reference to the [[Wikipedia:Elysium|Elysian Fields]] in Greek mythology.
*When [[Nieve]] is killed during [[Monkey Madness II]], the player has the opportunity to retrieve her [[Elysian spirit shield (Monkey Madness II)|elysian spirit shield]], however those who do soon find out that it has crumbled to dust and is useless.
*When attaching an elysian sigil to a blessed spirit shield, the shield becomes lighter in weight. This trait is not shared with its arcane and spectral variants.
